description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A creature you are aware of damages you with a melee Strike.

Your wound yawns open, appalling your attacker. The attacker must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened} 1 (sickened 2 on a critical failure). It can’t recover from the sickened condition while it’s adjacent to you.
